Serves

Class ClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Serves.ClientHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener

    public class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    This is Client Handler class it. Handles all the client that have been accepted by the server and passed down to this class. This class is responsible for redirecting the the messages and client chat. This Class is notified whenever there is a need to send messages or game data is being send
    Author:
    708114
